amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for certain releases or discharges of water from Lake Okeechobee to the Caloosahatchee Estuary or the Indian River Lagoon.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2999 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2999 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4333) To prohibit the use of funds for certain releases or discharges of water from Lake Okeechobee to the Caloosahatchee Estuary or the Indian River Lagoon.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2999 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2999 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 2910.
